rfc.title: IDL Data Structure for Raw ACF data
rfc.author: R.J.Barnes

summary.p: A description of the IDL data structure used to store Raw ACF data.

body.p: The raw ACF data is the primary (first order) data product from the SuperDARN radars. Within IDL a structure is used to store the ACF data.
A number of constants are used to define array limits

td.pre: raw={RawData, $ revision: {rlstr, major: 0L, $ ; major revision minor: 0L}, $ ; minor revision thr: 0.0, $ ; lag-zero power threshold level pwr0: fltarr(MAX_RANGE), $ ; lag zero powers acfd: fltarr(MAX_RANGE,LAG_SIZE,2), $ ; ACF data xcfd: fltarr(MAX_RANGE,LAG_SIZE,2) $ ; XCF data }
